with (this){ var arr = []; arr.push(` `); arr.push(escape( title )); arr.push(` `); arr.push(escape( msg )); arr.push(` `); arr.push( no_escaped_html ); arr.push(`

This is a escaped template tag: {{ msg }}

`); arr.push(` `); if (true) { arr.push(`

This is inside a Js condition

`); } arr.push(`

Using the stdlib:

  • sum: `); arr.push(escape( sum('2.5', 3, 2) )); arr.push(`
  • subtract: `); arr.push(escape( subtract('2.5', 3, 2) )); arr.push(`
  • strBefore: `); arr.push(escape( strBefore('Lorem ipsum dolor sit', 'ipsum') )); arr.push(`
  • strAfter: `); arr.push(escape( strAfter('Lorem ipsum dolor sit', 'ipsum') )); arr.push(`
  • remove: `); arr.push(escape( remove('Lorem ipsum dolor sit', 'ipsum') )); arr.push(`
  • titleCase: `); arr.push(escape( titleCase('lorem ipsum dolor sit') )); arr.push(`
  • range: `); arr.push(escape( range(1, 10) )); arr.push(`
  • join: `); arr.push(escape( join(['you', 'me', 'I'], ', ', ' and ') )); arr.push(`
  • round: `); arr.push(escape( round(1.446, 2) )); arr.push(`
`); arr.push(`
Tundra - The comprehensive template engine
`); arr.push(` `); return arr.join(''); }
